name: Frogger
summary: An adaptation of the arcade game Frogger. The player controls a flashing dot (the "frog") and has to cross the lines without touching any moving tiles throughout the level. A level is completed when the player successfully crosses the lines 5 or 10 times. In some models the game is called "Frog Across River", further referencing its origin. Also appear reverse visible the lines and tiles.
